name: A Time Immemorial
description:
---------------------------

a nebulous ground-haze accompanies the arrival of morning

...

iridescent clouds glitter like a kaleidoscope in the sky

.....

the ebbing sunlight sparkles in the jewels of the evening dew

........

the stars glitter above you, perhaps signaling in a cosmic morse code

...............

your footsteps begin to effortlessly flow, drawn forward by the undertow of time

---------------------------
